languages.text: "Путь Изгоя научил меня не доверять никому, мон-кай. И ты закрепил{mf||а} мою веру в то, что сближаться с твоим видом было затеей напрасной".
"My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that trying to find common ground with your species was an exercise in futility."
languages.original_text: "Путь Изгоя научил меня не доверять никому, мон-кай. И ты закрепил{mf||а} мою веру в то, что сближаться с твоим видом было затеей напрасной".

traits.locale_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that building rapport with your species was an exercise in futility."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that building rapport with your species was an exercise in futility."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that trying to find common ground with your species was an exercise in futility."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that trying to find common ground with your species was an exercise in futility."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我的流浪者道途教会我不要相信任何人，猴子。与你之间的经历让我更加坚信，尝试与你的族群达成共识的一切努力，都将注定徒劳无功。”
languages.original_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that trying to find common ground with your species was an exercise in futility."

traits.locale_text: “我的流浪者道途教会我不要相信任何人，猴子。而与你的经历让我更加坚信，与你们建立友好关系的一切尝试，都是徒劳无功的。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「追放者の道は、誰も信用などできないという事を教えてくれたよ、モン＝ケイ。そしてお前は、お前たちの種族との共通点を見出そうとしても無駄だという我の信念を補強してくれた」
languages.original_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that trying to find common ground with your species was an exercise in futility."

traits.locale_text: 「追放者の道は、誰も信用などできないという事を教えてくれたよ、モン＝ケイ。そしてお前は、お前たちの種族との共通点を見出そうとしても無駄だという我の信念を補強してくれた」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «La Senda de la Proscrita me ha enseñado a no confiar en nadie, mon-keigh, y has reforzado mi creencia en que buscar una posición común con tu especie es un ejercicio inútil».
languages.original_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that trying to find common ground with your species was an exercise in futility."

traits.locale_text: «La Senda de la Proscrita me ha enseñado a no confiar en nadie, mon-keigh, y has reforzado mi creencia en que entablar relaciones con tu especie es un ejercicio inútil».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Pfad der Ausgestoßenen hat mich gelehrt, niemandem zu trauen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Und Ihr habt meine Überzeugung noch gestärkt, dass es ein vergebliches Unterfangen war, nach Gemeinsamkeiten mit Eurer Spezies zu suchen."
languages.original_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that trying to find common ground with your species was an exercise in futility."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Pfad der Ausgestoßenen hat mich gelehrt, niemandem zu trauen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Und Ihr habt meine Überzeugung noch gestärkt, dass es ein vergebliches Unterfangen war, eine Verbindung zu Eurer Spezies aufzubauen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « La Voie de l'Errance m'a appris à ne faire confiance à personne, mon-keigh, et le temps que j'ai passé à vos côtés n'a fait que me conforter dans l'idée qu'il est vain de chercher à s'entendre avec votre espèce. »
languages.original_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that trying to find common ground with your species was an exercise in futility."

traits.locale_text: « La Voie de l'Errance m'a appris à ne faire confiance à personne, mon-keigh, et le temps que j'ai passé à vos côtés n'a fait que me conforter dans mon idée qu'il est vain de tenter de nouer des liens avec votre espèce. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yurtsuzun Yolu'nda kimseye güvenmemeyi öğrendim ben mon-keigh. Sen de türünüzle aynı paydada buluşmaya çalışmanın nafile olduğuna dair inancımı güçlendirdin."
languages.original_text: "My Path of the Outcast has taught me to trust no one, mon-keigh. And you have reinforced my belief that trying to find common ground with your species was an exercise in futility."
